title: Ticket #2837: Add user-specific for condor_config search location for windows
description: For unix, we added ${HOME}/.condor/condor_config as a location that Condor binaries will look at to file the Condor configuration file. This lets users set up a personal Condor without having to set CONDOR_CONFIG in their environment all of the time. We may want to have the same ability on Windows.
remarks:
2012-Feb-21 16:01:22 by johnkn:
use ShGetFolderPath with CSIDL_PROFILE to give you the users home directory (i.e. c:\users\johnsmith)

A more appropriate place might be CSIDL_LOCAL_APPDATA, (c:\users\johnsmith\AppData\local). This is for files that programs use but that are not the users files per-se.
creator: jfrey
